name: Jira (Atlassian)
description: Project and incident tracking — create tickets, manage sprints, and track security remediation

tools: create_issue — Create a new Jira issue
add_comment — Add a comment to an issue
transition_issue — Move issue through workflow states

setup_steps: 1. Create API token: id.atlassian.com → Security → API Tokens
2. Or use Atlassian Remote MCP with OAuth (recommended)
4. Set JIRA_EMAIL to the service account email
security_notes: Prefer Atlassian Remote MCP (OAuth) over self-hosted with API tokens
API tokens have full account permissions — use a dedicated service account
Issue creation via AI should follow your existing ticket templates
Sensitive security findings in tickets — ensure project permissions are restricted
